overview: No less than 17 – yes, that’s right, seventeen! – of the hottest beauties ever to appear in front of the STAXUS lens line up to take one for the team in an almost endless line-up of sultry solo set-pieces. From sweet and vulnerable doe-eyed twinks to masterful studs to down-and-out sluts, the array of talent is almost too much to take in; as cock after beautiful cock discovers that they’re simply no match to a tightly clenched fist! The result – every time! – is a plethora of hot, sticky jizz and the deliciously sweet sensation of freshly-emptied balls!
title: Taking One For The Team
